original_text: For as Jonas was three days and three nights in the whale's belly; so shall the Son of man be three days and three nights in the heart of the earth.
korean_text: 요나가 밤낮 사흘 동안 큰 물고기 뱃속에 있었던 것 같이 인자도 밤낮 사흘 동안 땅 속에 있으리라

sentences.original_text: For as Jonas was three days
and three nights in the whale's belly;
sentences.korean_translation: 고기 뱃속에서 사흘 밤 동안 있었던 것처럼

sentences.original_text: so shall the Son of man be three days
and three nights in the heart of the earth.
sentences.korean_translation: 땅의 심중에서 사흘 밤 동안 있을 것임
